instructions: On your Mac, choose Apple menu > System Preferences, then click Apple ID. In the sidebar, click Name, Phone, Email, then click Edit next to Hide My Email. Choose a different email address, then click Done.

Tap Listen Now. To download an episode for offline playing, tap the Download icon . If you don t see the Download icon , the episode is already downloaded. To get notifications whenever a new episode is available, tap the Notification Settings button .

Tap the Settings icon from your home screen or app drawer. Swipe up to scroll down to the bottom of the settings menu. Tap System . How to factory reset Oreo Hit Reset options . Select Erase all data (factory reset) . Swipe up to scroll down to the bottom of the page. How to factory reset Oreo Hit the Reset phone button. Enter your device PIN and select Continue . Tap Erase everything . How to factory reset Oreo

Tap the Settings icon from your home screen or app drawer. Swipe up to scroll down to the bottom of the page. Tap the General management tab. How to factory reset a Samsung phone Select Reset . Hit Factory data reset . Scroll down to the bottom of the page. How to factory reset a Samsung phone Hit the blue Reset button. Enter your device PIN and tap Next . Tap Delete all . How to factory reset a Samsung phone
